name: Mammal
description: Adaptable and social. Primary Sub-Stats: Empathy & Stamina.

name: Reptile/Amphibian
description: Resilient and perceptive. Primary Sub-Stats: Toughness & Intuition.

name: Avian
description: Swift and commanding. Primary Sub-Stats: Agility & Presence.

name: Aquatic
description: Powerful and enduring. Primary Sub-Stats: Might & Endurance.

name: Plant
description: Patient and wise. Primary Sub-Stats: Willpower & Knowledge.

name: Insect
description: Intricate and logical. Primary Sub-Stats: Finesse & Reasoning.
